caption:
“Heaven hides in ordinary moments.”

Reflection:
The sacred does not shout; it lingers in simplicity — in shared bread, in morning light.

Commentary:
This reflection calls us to find holiness in the mundane. The divine often wears the disguise of the familiar, waiting to be noticed.
